General.Name: Focus Point Holdings Bhd
General.Description: Focus Point Holdings Berhad, an investment holding company, operates professional eye care centers primarily in Malaysia. The company operates through three segments: Optical related products, Franchise management, and Food and beverages. It is involved in the trading of eyewear and eye care products; and management of franchised professional eye care centers, and food and beverage outlets. The company also engages in provision of medical eye care and laser eye surgery treatment services; offers hearing aid solutions and related accessories; retail of optical related products; and provision of food and beverages services. It operates its stores under the Focus Point, Focus Point Signature, Focus Point Outlet, Focus Point Concept Store, Focus Point Lifestyle Eyefont, Opulence, Optometris Anggun, i-Focus, Whoosh, and Komugi brand names. Focus Point Holdings Berhad was founded in 1989 and is based in Petaling Jaya, Malaysia.
